title: How to build a library from my Kindle Amazon ebooks - Quora

response.answer_text: The only thing that you can do is to use all five Kindle logins that you are allowed. Note that one of the limitations of Kindle eBooks is that you agreed to do this. You didn’t purchase the books, just (effectively) a license to read them. If you are looking for an Open Library to share, then promote Project Gutenberg at Carnegie Mellon University: Gutenberg.org.
If you own a kindle.. Books get added to your library automatically
